mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, lostreply.* from (select * from lostreply where lost_no=#{lost_no} order by lostreply_ref desc,lostreply_seq asc) lostreply)
mapper.update: update lostreply set lostreply_content=#{lostreply_content}, lostreply_date=sysdate where lostreply_no=#{lostreply_no}
update lostreply set lostreply_seq=lostreply_seq+1 where lostreply_ref=#{lostreply_ref} and lostreply_seq > #{lostreply_seq}
